names.english: cool the blood and eliminate wind powder
names.commonEnglish: Cool the Blood and Eliminate Wind Powder

actions: Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin and generates fluids.
Tonifies, activates and harmonizes the Blood, reduces swelling, expels pus, generates flesh and alleviates pain.
Releases the Exterior, expels Wind, vents rashes and relieves itching.
With Dang Gui, for itching and tremors of the hands and feet from Wind due to Blood Deficiency.
Disperses Wind, clears Heat, vents rashes and relieves itching.
Clears Heat, dries Dampness, disperses Wind and stops itching.
With Chan Tui and Jing JIe, for generalized itching.
Dispels Wind and stops itching.
With Dang Gui, Jing Jie and Chan Tui, for eczema with itching.
Clears Heat, drains Fire, nourishes Yin and moistens Dryness.
Clears Heat in the Qi Stage, drains Fire, relieves irritability, quenches thirst and heals eczema, burns and ulcerated sores and wounds.
With Zhi Mu, for a high fever from Wind-Heat with irritability and extreme thirst.
With Sheng Di Huang, for excessive Fire with injured fluids.
with Sheng Di Huang and Zhi Mu, for Stomach Fire.
Clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity, moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.
Expels Wind
Clears Heat
Cools the Blood
Nourishes Yin and Blood
Eliminates Dampness
syndromes: Wind-Heat with Blood Dryness with Wind-Heat Predominant

symptoms: The lesions have a slightly erythematous base
The scales are dry and powdery
The scales may be very thick on the scalp
